A '''test instance block''' is a technical [[block]] that is used for [[game test]]s.

== Obtaining ==
Test instance blocks are available using the {{cmd|setblock}}, {{cmd|fill}}, {{cmd|give}}, or {{cmd|test}} commands, and are available in the [[Creative inventory]] under the ''Operator Utilities'' tab. When placed, test instance blocks are unbreakable in [[Survival]] and have the same blast resistance as [[bedrock]].

== Usage ==
Test instance blocks cannot be placed in [[Survival]]. When placed, {{control|use}} the test instance block to open its GUI. The GUI opens only if the player is in [[Creative]] mode, and has [[permission level]] 2 or higher. Based on the status of the test, the block produces a beam similarly to a [[beacon]], with the color being {{color|#808080}} for a running test, {{color|#00ff00}} for a successful test, {{color|#ff0000}} for a failed required test, and {{color|#ff8000}} for a failed optional test.
